page.title: 03Boreland of Kelton Farm
page.content: Boreland of Kelton Farm is a beef and sheep farm which grows barley and hay as crops. They also grow grass for silage. They have blue-grey cattle as well as Charolais cattle. They have Suffolk and Textal sheep. They have a lot of cross ewes. 50% of the land is woodland and bushes. The other 50% are crops and grazing land. The farm house was built in 1880. They have a large amount of machinery but do not do any contracting. There are 18 people living and 4 workers employed on the farm.
